==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かん|にゅう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|ja|陥|入|tr1=kan|tr2=nyū|t1=to collapse, to fall in|t2=to enter}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かんにゅう}}

# falling in (like a [[cave in]]), [[collapse]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|かんにゅう}}

# to [[fall in]], to [[cave in]]
